General.Name: ExGen Resources Inc
General.Description: ExGen Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada and the United States. The company primarily explores for copper and gold deposits. It holds interest in the Boss, Empire Mine, and Buena Vista properties located in United States; and Gordon Lake and DOK Properties located in Canada. The company was formerly known as Boxxer Gold Corp. and changed its name to ExGen Resources Inc. in December 2014. ExGen Resources Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1140 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4G1
